systemProperty.descriptionCdata: 10145842-a0e0-4dc4-ab0e-ca9041d0b3cd.description=This is used in the Savvis/SMA/SVVS SMA Vantive Case Closure.\nTrue, Action Notification will be fired in the Vantive for Not Savvis IT and Not JP originationDesk\nFalse, Action Notification will not be fired in the Vantive for Not Savvis IT and Not JP originationDesk
systemProperty.name: SMA_VCC_NOT_SAVVISIT_ACTION_NOTIFICATION
